element.name: avidemux
element.description: Demultiplex an avi file into audio and video
element.author: Erik Walthinsen <omega@cse.ogi.edu>, Wim Taymans <wim.taymans@chello.be>, Thijs Vermeir <thijsvermeir@gmail.com>

caps.name: audio_%u

element.name: avimux
element.description: Muxes audio and video into an avi stream
element.author: GStreamer maintainers <gstreamer-devel@lists.freedesktop.org>

caps.name: audio_%u
caps.details: audio/x-raw, format=(string){ U8, S16LE }, rate=(int)[ 1000, 96000 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2 ]; audio/mpeg, mpegversion=(int)1, layer=(int)[ 1, 3 ], rate=(int)[ 1000, 96000 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2 ]; audio/mpeg, mpegversion=(int)4, stream-format=(string)raw, rate=(int)[ 1000, 96000 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2 ]; audio/x-ac3, rate=(int)[ 1000, 96000 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 6 ]; audio/x-alaw, rate=(int)[ 1000, 48000 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2 ]; audio/x-mulaw, rate=(int)[ 1000, 48000 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2 ]; audio/x-wma, rate=(int)[ 1000, 96000 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2 ], wmaversion=(int)[ 1, 2 ]
